text: Generalized linear mixed models were fitted for binomial or multinomial cervical screening test responses using SAS version 9.4 (SAS Institute, Inc., United States).Random effects models were used to calculate predicted probabilities for cervical screening results by age categories, HIV status and other factors of interest (see Web annex A, Supplementary material 6).
